modules.title: Network Security
modules.description: Understanding network security concepts, including firewalls, VPNs, and intrusion detection systems.

modules.title: Compliance and Operational Security
modules.description: Knowledge of compliance frameworks, risk management, and operational security practices.

modules.title: Threats and Vulnerabilities
modules.description: Identifying and mitigating threats and vulnerabilities in various environments.

modules.title: Access Control and Identity Management
modules.description: Understanding access control models, identity management, and authentication mechanisms.

modules.title: Cryptography
modules.description: Knowledge of cryptographic concepts, algorithms, and their applications in securing data.
